段: 頭殼手指頭仔頷頸仔胸坎腹肚腰肚臍指甲大腿跤頭趶面目睭目眉頭毛目睭毛鼻仔下頦喙唇喙[卑+頁]耳仔鼻空耳空喙齒喙舌

Thau5-khak4 tshiu2 tsing2-thau5-a2 am7-kun2-a2 hing1-kham2 pak4-too2 io1 too7-tsai5 tsing2-kah4 tua7-thui2 kha1-thau5-u1bin7bak8-tsiu1bak8-bai5thau5-mng5bak8-tsiu1-mng5phinn7-a2e7-hai5tshui3 tun5tshui3-phue2hinn7-a2phinn7-khang1hinn7-khang1tshui3-khi2tshui3-tsih8
阮兜的人外公外媽阿母阿兄阿姊小弟阿公阿媽阿爸小妹我
Guan2 tau1 e5 lang5 gua7-kong1 gua7-ma2 a1-bu2 a1-hiann1 a1-tsi2 sio2-ti7 a1-kong1 a1-ma2 a1-pa1 sio2-mue7 gua2
真趣味，線纏牢好準備；無跤會走，無喙會吼。真快樂，原來伊是杆轆。
Tsin1 tshu3-bi7, suann3 tinn5 tiau5 ho2 tsun2-pi7; bo5 kha1 e7 tsau2, bo5 tshui3 e7 hau2. tsin1 khuai3-lok8, guan5-lai5 i1 si7 kan1-lok8.
鞦韆！鞦韆！好[辶@日]迌，幌去樹頂挽仙桃，幌啊幌，搖啊搖，阿母看著驚一趒。
Tshiu1-tshian1! Tshiu1-tshian1! ho2 tshit4-tho5, hainn3 khi3 tshiu7-ting2 ban2 sian1-tho5, hainn3--ah4 hian2, io5--a2 io5, a1-bu2 khuann3-tioh8 kiann1-tsit8-tio5.
紅田嬰，好輕功，飛懸飛低真輕鬆；紅田嬰，展輕功，飛來飛去耍規工。
Ang5 tshan5-inn1 , ho2-khin1-kang1, pue1-kuan5-pue1-ke7 tsin1 khin1-sang1; ang5 tshan5-inn1, tian2 khin1-kang1, pue1-lai5-pue1-khi3 sng2 kui1 kang1.
露螺！露螺！頭殼頂二枝角，軟軟袂相觸，身軀揹一个殼，毋驚日頭曝。
Loo7-le5! loo7-le5! thau5-khak4-ting2 nng7 ki1 kak4, nng2-nng2 be7 sio1-tak4, sin1-khu1 phainn7 tsit8 e5 khak4, m7-kiann1 jit8-thau5 phak8.
水牛拖車，做頭前，手牽牛索，真無閒，牛車駛去，牛車路，農村收成，大幫助。
Tsui2-gu5 thua1-tshia1, tso3 thau5-tsing5, tshiu2 khan1 gu5-soh4, tsin1 bo5-ing5, gu5-tshia1 sai2 khi3, gu5-tshia1 loo7, long5-tshuan1 siu-sing5, tua7 pang1-tsoo7.
